Text: Good book! Very small, so I thought it is fake but it is not! The only problem is the book is super old!
I was looking for C++. Its way better than C language. Seeding it :)

Volcanthegreat, erm, no, it isn't. Why do beginners feel so compelled to make bold, uninformed statements? The C++ language is a fucking disgusting mess. Google around for Linux Torvlad's opinion on the matter. Linus is never wrong.
jester995: Now who look who's making bold, uninformed statements. They're different languages, neither one is better than the other. Stop your bickering.
Thanks so much! The other two versions of the book on the site are either non-text or don't work at all. Your version is the best!
